p: Viral RNA extraction was performed using the High the High Pure RNA Isolation kit (Roche) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Real-time RT-PCR was performed using the TaqMan™ Fast Virus 1-Step Master Mix (ThermoFisher Scientific) and the following forward primer, reverse primer and probe: AAGACCAATCCTGTCACCTCTGA, CAAAGCGTCTACGCTGCAGTCC and 6-FAM TTTGTGTTCACGCTCACCGTGCC-TAMRA. Amplification and detection was performed on an ABI7700 (ThermoFischer Scientific) using the following program: 5 min 50 °C, 20” 95 °C, [3” 95 °C, 31” 60 °C] × 45 cycles.
